column5: A few of the neighbors around here put their garbage out days before pick-up and it always leads to bears coming out for a free feast. After they finished stuffing themselves last night they took a short-cut across my front lawn to get back into the woods. Big tracks on the left will be Momma and the little ones on the right will be a cub
Or it was........the biggest raccoon known to man!
Well it certainly wasn't my little pooch
I'd be having words with those neighbours if I where you!  That's plain ignorant!
They have been spoken to...many times...but they still don't get it.  But they'll probably be the 1st to want the bears killed when something serious happens.
That's a little too close for comfort...especially with a cub...hope nothing serious happens...  Maureen
Ya fooled me Lew, I thought this was a big musky story in the making, but winnie and poo bear is cool too
I too thought Lew was gonna break out a few Musky Pics...  That is a little too close for comfort!  RJ
